text: The National Arts Centre Orchestra is an orchestra in Ottawa, Canada's capital. Since 1998 their conductor (musical director) has been Pinchas Zukerman. The orchestra was started in 1969. It has made more than 40 recordings and toured widely throughout the world. ==Other websites== * National Arts Centre Orchestra ==Related pages== *Ottawa, Ontario Category:Orchestras Category:Organizations based in Ottawa Category:Canadian musical groups Category:Musical groups established in 1969 Category:1969 establishments in Canada
title: National Arts Centre Orchestra
